features: Efficient Heat Dissipation - Structured with geometry and big hole metal panel, 3 big cooling fans (110mm) and 3 small fans(65mm), the laptop cooler pad will deliver an impressive amount of cooling while still remaining quiet to boot. LCD display screen allows controlling rgb lights, fan speed and modes

Full RGB Lights - Design LED light strips in a circle outside the entire laptop cooling pad, with a width of 9mm/0.35", it's very cool and beautiful, an awesome gaming partner with your gaming laptop. 10 modes for you to choose, the rgb lighting can be turned off separately while cooling fans are still running

Ergonomic Height Stands - This rgb light cooling pad for a laptop has 7 different height settings, which allows you to adjust a comfortable posture from 16 degrees to 35 degrees, raising your laptop 4.3" to 7.5" high. Weighs 2.57 lb, it is lightweight to carry with you. Relieve pain your shoulder and spine, guide you a healthy lifestyle

Wide Compatibility - A hideable mobile phone holder that can be used on both sides releases your hand. Anti-slip pads keep your laptop from slipping, USB powered in right side, easy to plug, extra port enable a keyboard, mouse or other device use. 16.33" long, 11.81" wide, 1.45" high, diagonal 18.26" long, the laptop fans cooling pad works with 14" - 18" laptops.

Desk and Lap Use - With a metal hook and oversized base, it's very easy to adjust different height, lifting the hook and put it to any slot you like and you can use the laptop cooling pads anywhere, such as desk, lap, sofa, bed. Say goodbye to computer cooling pads with a thin base

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these for a two 17" laptops and it's perfect! Light weight but durable, super easy to set-up and adjust the different heights. Phone does not fit in the holder, but I knew it wouldn't with a case on the phone when I purchased it. But the holder works great for storing the USB Cable during transit. The 6 fans keep the entire laptop really cool with no heat felt. works great on the lap, at school (actually fits in a backpack) and on the office desk. Super quiet and the lights and different settings for the lights are cool. Also works with lights turned off. Purchased for a standard laptop and a laptop the folds into a tablet, works great for both. Will purchase more in the future for Samsung tablets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for Performance and Aesthetic
reviews.reviewText: THIS... Is KeiBn's Laptop Cooling Pad and it is quite cooler than I expected (sorry that was bad). It comes with an adjustable stand and a USB to USB cable to plug into your laptop. Its UI is simple, a power button, plus and minus for the fans (6 levels), and a light button that goes through the LED options and you can hold it to power off. The RGB was shockingly well done for something at this price point and the fans are also very quiet.The fans are more powerful than I expected, I didn't do anything scientific for this so we are about to enter some bro science but here we go. My Laptop is a Razer with a 3080 in it, and would get so hot I couldn't use the keyboard while gaming. The fans cool it so much that even after gaming for hours it is only warm to the touch (and it was burn your leg hair off before). I attribute this to the well-placed fans fitting right where my computers intake fans are and that the fans spin up quite well. Not a crazy performance boost... but enough to justify the purchase!If you like how it looks, then I can certainly say it keeps my heater cooled off enough to be comfortable for hours. RGB was beyond expectation, fans work great and arent audible... I mean this is really a great cooling pad. The lifting mechanism is quite strong for me to type on my laptop while elevated. I think you will share the same sentiment as I do should you purchase this cooling pad as It was a great solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After surgery, I was working mostly on my laptop with it sitting on my lap while either seated or laying down. My laptop would get very hot due to the lack of airflow. I purchased this and it makes the laptop much easier to see and use and the fans are adjustable and keep my lap cool as well! The lights are fun to look at and inspire creativity as well! Much needed for my situation and my computer and it worked perfectly! Definitely worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This Laptop Cooler is well designed in all the right places...UPDATE
reviews.reviewText: I got this particular laptop cooler A: Because I needed one fast, and B: I wanted one that didn't have the design flaws of my previous product, made by Kootec. On the Kootec, the USB cord was built to go underneath the adjustable bracket used to set the angle of the laptop fan table. Needless to say, over time, despite being careful, the USB cord was damaged to the point that it simply stopped working. The Keibn cooler I just received came with a braided, two-male USB cable, that plugs into the SIDE of the unit, away from any pinch-points. While that only leaves 1 USB port open it's still a good call because there's nothin' like having to toss a good piece of hardware because the power cord isn't worth the hassle/time to replace. While light, the construction is solid, with heavy-duty stops to keep even heavy laptops from sliding off when angled. I personally found the pulsating lights to be annoying (old age) and was glad to find that I could turn them off by holding down the light button for 4 sec. The unit has 6 fan settings and is very VERY quiet. I liked that. Note: Vacuum your cooler occasionally, it'll save the fans and keep 'em quiet. Haven't figured out how to detach the phone holder, I would probably not use it anyway. For the price, I think, with care, that this should last at least as long as this 20yr Alienware M1 laptop! Update: So, here's the "Chicken or the Egg" question: The fans push the air to the bottom of the laptop, and yes, it does seem to cool it well, although the laptop's internal fan runs occasionally. My question: Should the fans run forward (push), air to the bottom of the laptop, or is it more efficient to run backward (pull), thus pulling heat AWAY from the bottom of the laptop? Any engineers out there?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome lights and works great!
reviews.reviewText: This cooler runs really smoothly. It is quiet and keeps my son's laptop cool. It also has really cool lights on it that make his videos awesome. I thought the lights would take away from the cooling effect but they don't at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY impressive cooling -- 25F - 30F cooler average on all components
reviews.reviewText: I don't usually take the time to write this thorough of a review, but I think this pad honestly deserves it. I have an older Precision, but it is still capable of significant performance. However, it is bulky and gets pretty hot when I'm running a game, rendering a video, or recording music. So, I decided to get a cooling pad. I got this pad because it was cheap and would arrive the next day. For the price, I was expecting maybe 10 degrees cooler, but it more than doubled that temp drop. It also took much longer for it to heat up. It looks nice and is highly functional, but I got it for the purpose of cooling and in this aspect, it truly exceeded my every expectations. Details are below.Laptop: 16 inch Dell PrecisionCooling mechanics: intakes air from the bottom and keypad, exhaust is out of the backStress tests performed: stress-ng (Linux CLI program) and web-based GPU stress, simultaneously, ran for 5 minutes.Highlights (see pic for details)CPU: -25AMBIENT 1: -23AMBIENT 2: -31RAM: -16 & -21GPU: -24FYI: IF YOU WANT TO TURN THE LEDs OFF, just hold down the LED button for about 5 seconds. Do the same to turn them back on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works great as soon as i got it i was able to easily and quicly plug it in for use. Air flow is amazing keeps everything cool regardless where i place it. I love the leds for around the base as well as the lit up fans. Its lightweight easily movable and small enough to fit in my computer bag yet heavy enough to be stable. Cant wait to see how long this product lasts and plan to use it everyday until it breaks and even then ill probably reorder.
Fait le travail qu'il est sensé faire sans être trop bruyant! Juste dommage que l'on ne puisse pas éteindre la lumière 🤷‍♀️

reviews.reviewTitle: Es un gran ventilador, de buen tamaño y bastante silencioso
reviews.reviewText: Me gustó mucho este modelo, primero me llegó con un pequeño defecto pero el vendedor se hizo responsable y pedí otro, el segundo llegó bien y sigue funcionando sin problemas, lo recomiendo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Arrived slightly broken but works great otherwise.
reviews.reviewText: (Dislike) : It's made of cheap plastic! There are two hinges at the front. One side was perfect, the other plastic hinge is broken off, and can lift completely out. I went on Amazon looking to see if I could get a replacement, but all they offered is for me to return it by UPS, and get my money back. I just wanted a new "Unbroken" one. I actually do like the product. It functions otherwise, so I decided to keep it.(Like) : It keeps my ryzen 7 Asus viviobook at 28 C Motherboard, 35 C GPU, and 36 C CPU. Fans are reasonably quiet even with all 6 going. The RGB looks really cool. If I had one without the broken hinge, then yes I would recommend this product. I just happened to get one slightly scratch-N-dent. I set it up even with the broken hinge, and it still works, and is sturdy, so I decided might as well keep it, rather than return through UPS for a refund, and go without a laptop cooler all together, while I would have to re-order and wait for a new one. I don't want my laptop to overheat. This laptop cooler does exacly that... COOL!!! It moves a-lot of air!

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buen producto pero…sus ventiladores no son tan potentes
reviews.reviewText: Me gusto mucho, vino súper bien y excelente calidad pero eso si, como tal los ventiladores no tiene suficiente potencia para una Lap gamer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks great but lack on its primary function.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this laptop cooling pad after considering a few others. One criterion for me was, I wanted RGB lighting. It's fantastic. However, the job of cooling is underwhelming. I don't know if all cooling pads are the same as this is the first time I bought a cooling pad. Even at the highest level, i.e., 6, I feel the laptop is warm enough. I may as well keep it as the lighting is cool.
